title: Mute R. Kelly
itunes:title: Mute R. Kelly
description:
The Breakfast Club is back!! and we had to open up the phone lines after the social media response over "Surviving R.Kelly" Documentary happened over the weekend, and lets just say the documentary did a good job at disturbing people. Also we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about Kevin Hart reconsidering hosting the Oscars. Also, we allowed listeners the chance of giving someone "Donkey of the Day" since Charlamagne was not back yet from vacation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

The Breakfast Club is back!! and we had to open up the phone lines after the social media response over "Surviving R.Kelly" Documentary happened over the weekend, and lets just say the documentary did a good job at disturbing people. Also we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about Kevin Hart reconsidering hosting the Oscars. Also, we allowed listeners the chance of giving someone "Donkey of the Day" since Charlamagne was not back yet from vacation.
